hero.title: Welcome to {{appName}}
hero.subtitle: Create professional CVs and resumes with ease. Your latest profile is automatically transformed into beautifully designed CV templates.

empty.filtered: No templates match the selected filter.
empty.title: No Templates Available
empty.subtitle: Create your profile to generate professional CV templates automatically.

profile.title: Create Your Profile
profile.description: Build your professional profile with personal information, experience, education, and skills.

templates.title: Template Gallery
templates.description: Choose from professional templates optimized for web viewing or print production.

export.title: Export Options
export.description: Download individual templates or use our API to generate custom versions.
